headline: Regeneron Pharmaceuticals (REGN) Faces Securities Class Action After Losing $9 Billion Value Following Q3 2024 Earnings Report- Hagens Berman
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, Jan. 9, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Regeneron Pharmaceuticals, Inc. faces a securities fraud class action after shares of the company plunged $84.59 on Oct. 31, 2024, wiping out about $9...
